version_description:
Thank you for the feedback you provided!

This update contains some minor improvements​ and fixes compatibility with iPhone 5.

If you have any issues, please contact us via support@pasteapp.me, we're always here to help!

This version brings support for iPad! Use Paste with any other apps, copy and paste, drag and drop, and never lose important data!

If you have any issues or feature suggestions, please let us know on support@pasteapp.me, we're always here to help!

This update fixes an issue related to search and improves initial sync performance.

If you have any issues or suggestions, please let us know on support@pasteapp.me, we're always here to help!

This update fixes an issue when you saw white/black screen after pinning snippet to a Pinboard.

If you have any issues or suggestions, please let us know on support@pasteapp.me, we're always here to help!

Hallo! 你好！Привет! Now Paste speaks your language!

This update contains German, Chinese, Russan, and Polish languages and more are coming. Thanks a lot to everyone who helped us with translation!

If you need any assistance, please let us know

Hi there! This version contains some minor sync-related fixes and improvements. We've also added some new languages and working on improving translations in general.

If you need any assistance or have any suggestion, please let us know on support@

It seems like in some cases Paste didn't clean up its temporary data. That's bad, so we have fixed it.

If you need any assistance or have any suggestion, please let us know on support@pasteapp.me, we're always here to help!

This update brings some more stability and performance to our iCloud sync engine.

If you need any assistance or have any suggestion, please let us know on support@pasteapp.me, we're always here to help!

This update brings some more stability and performance to our iCloud sync engine.

If you need any assistance or have any suggestion, please let us know on support@pasteapp.me, we're always here to help!

In some cases, Paste crashed while being in the background and asked you to send us a crash report. We have fixed that. And thanks for reports btw ;)

If you need any assistance or have any suggestion, please let us know on support@pasteapp.me, we'r

Thank you for using Paste and being so patient, we know you've been waiting for this update for a while.

This update improves handling clipboard changes on app and Today widget activation. It also makes the clipboard sync faster and more reliable

Please don't hesitate to contact us on support@pasteapp.me – we’re always happy to help!

This update brings editing of the clipboard history right in Paste and syncing the changes across all devices. It fixes a crash when renaming items and saving images to Photos as well as includes a few fixes in translations.

Thank you for using Pas

This update improves clipboard monitoring on iPad when running Paste in Slide Over.

Thank you for using Paste! Don't hesitate to contact us on support@pasteapp.me if you need any help!

"Hey Siri, what was the link I copied recently?"

This update introduces support for Siri Shortcuts – use Paste to build automation workflows to work with your clipboard history and pinboards.
